commentary_data: Avesh Khan to Gaikwad, , full but drifts down the leg side. Pooran didn't quite catch it perhaps because he made no movement.  Nope, nothing on UltraEdge, LSG lose their review...
Avesh Khan to Conway, , good length with plenty of width, Conway takes a slash and cuts it square of the wicket. Keeps it along the ground to get his first boundary!!
Avesh Khan to Conway, , top shot!! Avesh Khan comes from round the wicket but goes too full on off, sits perfectly for Conway to bring out the leaning cover drive. None of the fielders even moved...
Mayers to Gaikwad, , touch of class!! Too full outside off, Ruturaj Gaikwad with a superb square drive. Between point and short third for a boundary
Krunal Pandya to Gaikwad, , short but comes in with the arm onto leg, Gaikwad rocks back and guides his pull over mid-on. One bounce and four...
Gowtham to Gaikwad, , short and straight, Gaikwad stays back and whacks it over the bowler's head. Back hand slap down the ground for six!!

Gowtham to Gaikwad, , What a shot!! Gowtham tried shorter length, that disappeared. Now pitches it up on off, this time Gaikwad extends his arms on the drive down the ground. Over long-off for another six
Gowtham to Gaikwad, , Ruturaj is off to a flier again!! This time dances down the track as soon as the bowler releases, takes it on the pitch and lifts his drive over wide long-off for six.
Mark Wood to Conway, , good length on off, an uppish push by Conway but there is no extra cover in place. Finds that gap and runs away for four...
Mark Wood to Conway, byes, , banged in short on off, goes over Conway's pull and over Pooran's jump. Four byes...
Mark Wood to Conway, , 140.7 clicks hard length ball on the body, pulled at double the pace through deep backward square leg. Played with disdain there by Devon Conway!!
Mark Wood to Gaikwad, , length ball on the pads at some serious pace, Ruturaj Gaikwad gives it just a gentle flick and the ball lands over the deep backward square leg ropes.
Krunal Pandya to Gaikwad, 1 run, tossed up onto leg, driven towards long-on and that's
Krunal Pandya to Conway, , tossed up, Conway goes for it and gets it off the sweet spot of the bat on his slog. Over long-on, well over long-on despite that being the bigger boundary...
Krunal Pandya to Conway, , fired full outside off, Conway slams it at triple the pace over long-on for another six. He's reminding everyone he's out there too.
Yash Thakur to Gaikwad, , banged in short and puzzles Gaikwad who danced out. He wasn't in control as the ball just flies off his bat and luckily goes over short fine's head.

Ravi Bishnoi to Gaikwad,  Caught by Mark Wood!! First ball wicket for Ravi Bishnoi. Where were you hiding him all these overs, KL Rahul? This is flighted up and was there for the big drive, Gaikwad takes it on but gets a leading edge that almost flies over short third. But Mark Wood leaps in time to complete a superb catch.
Mark Wood to Conway, , hard length on middle, Devon Conway gives it a backhand smash down the ground. It goes straight and keeps running away from Mayers who chased after from mid-off

Mark Wood to Conway,  Caught by Krunal Pandya! Stunning catch! This was banged in short and Conway goes for the pull. Doesn't get the timing and gets only elevation. It looked like it would land short of the fielder but Pandya from deep backward square leg runs in and times his dive perfectly. The ball just lands into his hands as he falls down, LSG's fielding has been top notch!
Yash Thakur to Shivam Dube, , how badly Shivam Dube needed that shot!! This is pitched up on off, under the bat and Dube flat bats it straight as an arrow for a six!!
Yash Thakur to Shivam Dube, , short on middle, Dube pulls pretty convincingly and that goes to the right of deep mid-wicket. One bounce and four

Ravi Bishnoi to Shivam Dube, , 97kph, dropped short and Shivam Dube pounces. Stands tall, clears his front leg and slams it over wide long-on. It was the googly but the length was too short. 102m six!
Ravi Bishnoi to Shivam Dube, , back-to-back sixes! 102.9kph, quicker and fuller, this time it's right in the slot, Shivam Dube swings his bat hard to thump it over long-on

Ravi Bishnoi to Shivam Dube,  Caught by Mark Wood!! Gone! 93.7kph, Ravi Bishnoi is pumped up. Another wrong 'un, Shivam Dube shapes up to slog over mid-wicket. Loses his shape as he tries to over-hit. The ball lobs up off the top-edge and it's a straightforward catch for Wood at short third man.

Avesh Khan to Moeen Ali, , 127.7kph, slow and full outside off, Moeen Ali spots it and beautifully plays an aerial drive over extra cover. The man in the deep runs across and dives to his left but to no avail

Avesh Khan to Moeen Ali, , 121.6kph, beats extra cover to his left on this occasion does Moeen Ali. Pace off again, Moeen Ali stands tall and throws his bat at it to flay it past the fielder. No chance for long-off to cut it off

Avesh Khan to Moeen Ali, , hat-trick of fours for Moeen Ali! 129.8kph, yorker length outside off, Moeen Ali stays back and opens his bat-face to squeeze it away between short third man and backward point. Excellent placement

Ravi Bishnoi to Moeen Ali,  Stumped!! Third wicket for Ravi Bishnoi! Another googly at 96.5kph, Moeen Ali had danced down the track a long way for a mighty swing across the line. Bishnoi probably saw that and shortened his length. The ball turns away past the swinging blade and Pooran does the rest.

Ravi Bishnoi to Rayudu, , Rayudu gets off the mark with a boundary! In-drifter from Bishnoi, Rayudu gets down on one leg and sweeps hard over backward square leg. Off the inner part of the bat but the ball has the legs to reach the fence
Avesh Khan to Stokes, , 135.5kph, Avesh Khan slightly errs with his length as he goes for the yorker. Stokes hangs back, manages to get under it and tonks it over wide mid-off for a one-bounce four

Avesh Khan to Stokes,  Caught by Yash Thakur!! 123.4kph, pace off, full in length, Stokes gets down on one leg and is early into his slog across the line. The ball loops up off the outer edge and Thakur takes a safe catch at backward point.

Mark Wood to Rayudu, , wow! 143kph, that's a stylish shot from Rayudu. Walks across towards off and uses the bowler's pace and angle to his advantage. Brings his wrists into play to whip it over backward square leg. Short boundary and the man in the deep is just a spectator
Mark Wood to Rayudu, , shot! Rayudu goes downtown.  and Rayudu shimmies down the track to it. Converts it into a half-volley and smashes through the line. Wow, that came right off the meat of the bat
Yash Thakur to Rayudu, , just over shor third man! Slower delivery into the pitch, Rayudu opens his bat-face and slices it over the leaping Avesh at short third man

Mark Wood to Jadeja,  Caught by Ravi Bishnoi!! , hit-the-deck-hard length ball, Jadeja clears his front leg to heave it over mid-wicket. The timing isn't great and it's the longer boundary. Bishnoi gobbles it up at deep mid-wicket.

Mark Wood to Dhoni, ,  148.7kph, width served and Dhoni flashes his bat hard. Quick hands from the skipper and the ball flies over third man. No chance for Badoni to catch that. Wood has his hands on head
Mark Wood to Dhoni, , that's a biggie! Stays back, fetches this short ball from outside off and slams the pull over deep square leg. Back-to-back sixes! The crowd going bonkers. Three more balls left

Mark Wood to Dhoni,  Caught by Ravi Bishnoi!!  That was bowled at  by Mark Wood. On a length and wide of off, Dhoni throws the kitchen sink at it and ends up slicing it in the air. Easy catch for Bishnoi at deep cover.
Chahar to Rahul, , short ball, no venom to trouble the batter. Rahul has ample time to pick his spot. Pulls neatly over square leg and the ball bullets away
Stokes to Mayers, , 131.8kph, width served outside off, Mayers rocks back and slaps the cut over cover point
Stokes to Mayers, , back-to-back fours for Mayers! Stokes goes fuller, Mayers slightly crouches and lifts it over Rahul's head. Hit through the line
Stokes to Mayers, , even better! Slot ball from Stokes, full and outside off, allows Mayers to get under it. The left-hander tonks it over long-off. Clean hit for an 86m six
Chahar to Mayers, , 132.9kph, Chahar foles doles out width. Hint of extra bounce, but Mayers rocks back and plays an uppish punch to find the gap between cover and cover point
Chahar to Mayers, , short and Mayers hammers the pull through square leg. It was probably off-speed and Mayers punished him. Moves to 23 off 9!
Chahar to Mayers, , Chahar switches to round the wicket and bowls a low full toss outside off. Mayers neatly drives it through extra cover. Easily done!
Tushar Deshpande to Mayers, , , full toss outside off, Mayers shuffles across and swings hard. Loses his shape but gets enough elevation to clear Conway at mid-off
Tushar Deshpande to Mayers, , 114.6kph, Deshpande tries the slower ball and that's barely touched the deck. Too wide outside off and Mayers shoulders arms. 50 up for LSG and Deshpande under the pump!
Tushar Deshpande to Mayers, , 137.6kph, short of a good length ball, Mayers shuffles across and muscles it over long-on for a maximum! Moved across a long way and swatted it away
Chahar to Mayers, , Mayers is toying with the CSK bowlers. Off-speed short ball from round the wicket, Mayers spots it, waits and pulls over square leg
Chahar to Mayers, , knuckle ball, short and outside off, a hopping Mayers slaps it into the gap between cover point and extra cover. Chahar is struggling with his line and length
Chahar to Rahul, , 118.9kph, pace off again, Rahul sees that coming. Has ample time to pull it away over mid-wicket. Not quite off the middle but it's another boundary.

Moeen Ali to Mayers, 5 runs, 96.7kph, oh dear! Punched to extra cover for a single. A wild and needless throw at the bowler's end and the ball speeds away to the fence. CSK gifting runs.  His second fifty in as many matches...

Moeen Ali to Mayers,  Caught by Conway!! Moeen Ali strikes in his first over! 94.6kph, fullish delivery on middle, Mayers gets down on one leg to slogsweep and hits it straight down deep mid-wicket's throat. There was just one fielder around that region in the deep and Conway barely had to move. Some relief for CSK. But Mayers has done his job, got his team off to a flier.

Santner to Hooda,  Caught by Stokes!! Spin introduced and LSG lose two wickets in two overs! Hooda gets down on one leg to slogsweep and doesn't middle it. Hits it flat as well. Stokes runs to his right from long-on and jumps to gobble it up.

Moeen Ali to Rahul,  Caught by Gaikwad!! Oh has this game turned around or what! Serious impact from the spinners as another one departs! Floated up around off, it's in the slot for Rahul who goes for the slog-sweep. But he's hitting to the big side, and the connection isn't good enough. Gaikwad takes the catch at deep midwicket!

Santner to Krunal Pandya, , good use of the feet here. Krunal runs down the track, gets close enough to it and swings hard through the line. It's not the cleanest connection, but he still clears the long-on boundary
Moeen Ali to Stoinis, , here goes Stoinis! Floated up on off, right in the slot for him and he whacks it over long-on with a ferocious swing!

Moeen Ali to Krunal Pandya,  Caught by Jadeja!! Moeen gets his third! What a spell this is turning out to be! Krunal dances down, looks to go straight for a big hit but he's not to the pitch of it. Yet he tries going through with the shot and miscues it off the inside half right down long-on's throat. Jadeja's not dropping that ever.
RS Hangargekar to Pooran, ,  Full delivery slanted in on off, right in the hitting arc for Pooran who swipes it over midwicket. Goes a long way back into the stands!
RS Hangargekar to Pooran, , 137kph, back of a length outside off, and Pooran cuts beautifully through backward point! Oh what timing on it!
RS Hangargekar to Pooran, ,  Full delivery outside off at 135kph, Pooran goes hard at it and carves it over extra cover. Don't think he got it off the middle, but it clears the infield comfortably

Moeen Ali to Stoinis,  Bowled!! This is Moeen's final over and he's now got a wicket in every single one of them! Pushed through flat on middle, Stoinis backs away, looks to pull hard but it sneaks under him, hitting the top of leg stump.
Jadeja to Pooran, , now the length is a bit fuller, and  Goes like a rocket over the ropes!
Jadeja to Pooran, , oh this is an unbelievable shot!  Wow! Fired in full, Pooran switches around, swings madly and whacks it over cover
Jadeja to Pooran, 1 run, fired into the pads on leg stump, and Pooran flicks it through square leg for a single

Tushar Deshpande to Pooran,  Caught by Stokes!! The arms go up in delight! This has been a really good comeback from Deshpande after a difficult first over! Stuck to his plan of bowling wide to Pooran, and his execution has backed it up. Full and wide, Pooran reaches out, tries clubbing it down the ground but it goes flat to Stokes at long-off who makes no mistake.
Chahar to Gowtham, , now he abandons the plan of bowling wide outside off, bowls it on the stumps, and gets whacked! Full in the slot on middle, and it's slogged over midwicket for six!

Chahar to Gowtham, 2 runs,  Full and wide, Gowtham throws his bat at it, slices it up off the toe-end and it goes high in the air! Dube gets there comfortably after running across from short third, but fails to hang on

Tushar Deshpande to Ayush Badoni,  Caught by Dhoni!! Slower ball, Badoni advances down and swings hard. But he's through the shot early. It goes high in the air off the toe-end, and it's Dhoni getting under it, much to the delight of the Chennai crowd. Huge roar as he catches it.
Tushar Deshpande to Mark Wood, , slower one in the slot outside off, Wood hammers it over mid-off

Tushar Deshpande to Mark Wood, , scythed over point for six! Back of a length at the stumps, Wood steps away from the stumps, makes room and crunches it! But it's not a shot that will dampen the spirits of this crowd who are busy celebrating a  in what has been a happy homecoming!
